quests.name: Friends Aren't Food
objectives: Talk to Mother Gothel

Gather the materials needed for the coat:
  ‧ 10 Fiber
  ‧ 4 Fabric
  ‧ 2 Citrine
  ‧ 1 Iron Ingot
Bring the materials to Mother Gothel
Put on the Brown Faux-Fur-Trimmed Jacket
Return to Scar
Talk to Remy

Prepare Scar's dinner:
  ‧ 2 Tekka Maki
  ‧ 2 Sake Maki
Make sure you have everything to feed Scar in your Inventory.
Bring the sushi to Remy
Follow Remy as he gives Scar his food.
Talk to Scar

quests.name: Breaking Bones
objectives: Talk to Scrooge McDuck
Return to Scar

Gather the materials to improve your Royal Shovel:
  ‧ 5 Lion's Claw buried near the cliffs on the Sunlit Plateau.
  ‧ 5 Dry Wood
  ‧ 5 Iron Ingot
Craft the Lion's Claw Shovel Head.
Improve the Shovel by using the new Lion's Claw Shovel Head.
Remove 5 small wildebeest bones littering the Sunlit Plateau
Return to Scar
rewards: Shovel Upgrade (can remove Small Wildebeest Bones)

quests.name: The Circle of Life
objectives: Talk to Mother Gothel.

Gather the materials for the upgrade:
  ‧ 10 Purified Night Shard
  ‧ Old Bones in the mines under the Sunlit Plateau
Return to Scar
Place the Old Bones in the Volcanic Geyser in Scar's Cave.
Pick up the Ashes.
Plant the Ashes anywhere on the Sunlit Plateau.
Care for the Flower of Bones
Craft the Roaring Shovel Head.
rewards: Shovel Upgrade (can remove Large Wildebeest Bones)

spoilers.title: Old Bones location
spoilers.objective: During this quest Mother Gothel gives directions through the Vitalys Mine to the location of the Old Bones, they read: "When you walk into the mines, take a left, walk for a bit, take the first right you see, then take another left".

quests.name: The Making of a Monarch
objectives: Meet Scar at his Cave

Gather the meals for your dinner at Scar's.
  ‧ Teriyaki Salmon
  ‧ Snow White's Gooseberry Pie
Make sure you have the meals for your dinner with Scar in your Inventory.
Give the meals to Scar.
Talk to Merlin.

Gather the materials for the Sunbird Feeders:
  ‧ 40 Softwood
  ‧ 20 Cotton
  ‧ 10 Dark Wood
  ‧ 6 Red Bromeliad
  ‧ 6 Pink Houseleek
Craft the Sunbird Feeders (2)
Place the Sunbird Feeders near the pond on the Sunlit Plateau. (2)
Return to Scar
Feed Flowers to the Sunbirds on the Plateau (2)
Return to Scar
Return to Scar's Cave
Talk to Scar
Pick up the Mysterious Mirror Shard that just appeared in Scar's Cave.

quests.name: A Holiday Treat for Scar
objectives:
Plant, grow and harvest the following vegetables in the Forgotten Lands:
  ‧ 6 Bell Pepper.
  ‧ 6 Tomato.
  ‧ 8 Potato.
  ‧ 12 Zucchini.

Make sure you have the following vegetable in your Inventory:
  ‧ 6 Bell Pepper.
  ‧ 6 Tomato.
  ‧ 8 Potato.
  ‧ 12 Zucchini.
Bring the Vegetables to Jack Skellington.
